title: Updated 3 Bed / 1 Bath unit on 2nd Floor

3 Bedroom, 1 Bath apartment for rent on the second floor with a large master bedroom.', 'The property is one block away from George Lake Trail and less than half a mile from Calumet College.', 'No smoking and No Pets.', 'No security deposit is needed but a $400 move-in fee is required.', 'APPLICATION CAN BE COMPLETED ONLINE.', 'AN APPLICATION IS REQUIRED OF EACH APPLICANT OVER THE AGE OF 18.', 'A CRIMINAL, EVICTION, AND JUDGEMENT REPORT WILL BE RUN.', 'Property Features:
  • Freshly painted through-out
  • Carpets cleaned through-out
  • Appliances included
  • Forced air furnace
  • Coin-operated washer/dryer
  • Living Room 14x16
  • Master bedroom approx.', '10x10
  • Bedroom 2 approx.', '10x10
  • Bedroom 3 approx.10x9
Lease Terms: 12 months at $1075 Call or text
